page.title: 01South Kingswear,introduction
page.content: The River Dart has a small and but beautiful wooded estuary and a good harbour.Big ships can come in because of the deep water. Crabbing and fishing is an important industry.The Dart Valley Railway runs steam trains from Paignton to Kingswear for all the summer holiday makers.Kingswear is a quiet village except for the Lower Ferry queue,it has some local shops,a Yacht Marina and Yacht Club.The South side of Kingswear has many large houses,a former hotel is now time-share flats. There are several farms which have cattle,sheep and grow mainly cereals The Kingswear Castle is in line with Dartmouth Castle it is not open to visitors.A new section of the Coastal Footpath runs from Kingswear past Brownstone Battery and Coleton Fishacre to Mansands and Brixham.
